User’s Guide¶

There are several operational parts to gathering and processing transit system data to create the current vehicle status.

  • Operational Overview
  • Configuration
    • Python Log Capture
    • Java Log Capture
  • Capture the real-time position reports
    • All-In-One Log Capture
    • Tail Only Log Extract
  • Upload Stop, Route and Vehicle mappings
    • Mapping Preparation
    • Mapping Upload
  • Capture the Google GTFS definitions
  • Build the current transit system status
  • Demonstration
